data.title: See the Modern Family Cast Then & Now
data.meta_description: See how the stars of the beloved sitcom have changed over the past 12 years in honor of E!'s Mother's Day Modern Family marathon today.
data.text:
Modern Family fans, rejoice: The Pritchett-Dunphy-Tucker is here to fill your Mother's Day with laughter and love.

E! is celebrating Mother's Day 2021 with an all-day marathon of the beloved TV comedy starting at 8 a.m. today, Sunday, May 9.

Fans can enjoy the Modern Family fun by reliving some of Mitch and Cam's most hilarious moments parenting Lily, or Gloria and Jay's riotous relationship. And we can guarantee Haley Dunphy will be getting into some LOL-worthy hijinks.

While you settle into your couch for today's Modern Family binge-athon on E!, allow us to fill you with nostalgia as we look back at how much the stars have changed over the past 12 years.
